verses.roman:
'vaiṣṇave'ra teja dekhi' bhaṭṭera camatkāra
tāṅ-sabāra āge bhaṭṭa--khadyota-ākāra

synonyms: vaiṣṇavera—of the Vaiṣṇavas; teja—the brilliance; dekhi'-seeing; bhaṭṭera—of Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; camatkāra—surprised; tāṅ-sabāra—of all of them; āge—in front; bhaṭṭa—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; khadyota-ākāra—like a glowworm.
translation: He was surprised to see the brilliance of their faces. Indeed, among them Vallabha Bhaṭṭa seemed just like a glowworm.
